1.title: I'm Not Martin

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

1.plot: A hospital patient set to get his tonsils removed, but fears the cursed hospital may have other plans that include amputating his foot.

2.title: Grandpa's Glasses

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

2.plot: A curious boy accompanies his mother to his deceased grandfather's home. After trying on his grandfather's glasses, he realizes they may not be alone in the house as a sinister spirit seems to be lurking about.

3.title: My Old House

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

3.plot: Alice is lured back into her old Victorian house for one more night.

4.title: Mrs. Worthington

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

4.plot: Nate finds himself in trouble when he imagines his sister being punished for her bullying.

5.title: Return of the Pumpkinheads

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

5.plot: Karen and Zach's family moves to the same farm that once belonged to evil old man Palmer and his creatures.

6.title: Near Mint Condition

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

6.plot: Ted's obsession with online auctions threatens more than just his money stash.

7.title: Argh V

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

7.plot: Sam's parents latest impulse buy takes them on a road tip to an unfamiliar area.

8.title: Lotsa Luck

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

8.plot: Gregory looks to the legends of his Irish heritage to turn his bad luck around.

9.title: Spores

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

9.plot: While on a hike in the woods, strange things begin to happen to Melvin's family.

10.title: Goodwill Toward Men

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

10.plot: A mysterious gifts enters the home of Missy and her family, and there will be no rest for the merry.

1.title: Really You: Part 1

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

1.plot: When a young girl's new doll takes on a mysterious new identity, her brother is forced to find out what is going on and to save his sister from the terrifying new reality.

2.title: Really You: Part 2

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

2.plot: When a young girl's new doll takes on a mysterious new identity, her brother is forced to find out what is going on and to save his sister from the terrifying new reality.

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

3.plot: Tensions run high when a family receives a mysterious gift at Christmas.

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

4.plot: A friendship made between a bullied boy and a mysterious new kid at school leads to school pranks that threaten to get out of hand.

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

5.plot: When a young girl loses her father, she is forced to face her fears and move to a terrifying hotel where the staff have mysterious secrets.

6.title: The Red Dress

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

6.plot: When a teenage girl is faced with a moral dilemma, she learns that everything that can be had has a price.

7.title: Ghostly Stare

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

7.plot: Two children learn that when cemeteries are disturbed, not everything stays buried.

8.title: The Walls

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

8.plot: A family moves into a new home, but the son soon discovers there is something wrong within the walls.

9.title: Game Over

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

9.plot: An "expert" gamer plays a new game with a twist.

10.title: Alien Candy

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

10.plot: A sixth-grader who believes in extraterrestrials is approached by two eighth-graders who invite him to join a special club.

11.title: Fear Never Knocks

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

11.plot: Siblings sneak into Grandpa's office to play with a mysterious old recorder. They record their worst fears and play them back. They will soon regret this decision.

12.title: Best Friend Forever

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

12.plot: 12-year-old Jack Pierce performs an experiment at home, and finds himself saddled with a new best friend: Cheeky the Zombie.

13.title: The Black Mask

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

13.plot: Three friends find a mysterious mask that allows a glimpse into another time where they see a horrible accident they desperately try to prevent.

14.title: Afraid of Clowns

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

14.plot: Christopher is deathly afraid of clowns... are they really trying to get him or will he finally outgrow this childhood horror?

15.title: My Sister the Witch

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

15.plot: Alice comes home from boarding school acting strange. Pete, her brother, suspects that she is a witch. He does everything he can to thwart her attempts to practice her craft.

16.title: Wrong Number

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

16.plot: The two meanest girls at school prank call someone who turns out to be even meaner than they are.

17.title: Catching Cold

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

17.plot: A boy becomes obsessed with catching a mysterious ice cream truck that seems to haunt his neighborhood.

18.title: Pool Shark

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

18.plot: Can a handsome boy overcome his fear of the water and convince people there is a shark in the pool?

19.title: Lights Out

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

19.plot: Three kids decide the ghost hunter show they watch is lame. Filming inside the local mental hospital that closed 60 years ago should provide them with some interesting footage... but will it ever be seen?

20.title: The Perfect Brother

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

20.plot: Josh's brother Matt is perfect, maybe just a little too perfect.

21.title: Scary Mary: Part 1

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

21.plot: Three friends dare to find out if the myth of a dead girl who can reach through the mirror to "take your face" is really true.

22.title: Scary Mary: Part 2

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

22.plot: Hanna's friends make her call forth the urban legend "Scary Mary" -- by looking in the mirror and chanting her name. Who knew she might actually show up?

1.title: Creature Feature: Part 1

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

1.plot: While watching the 1957 sci-fi B-movie "I Was a Teenage Tick", John is sucked into the world of the film.

2.title: Creature Feature: Part 2

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

2.plot: Will John find a way home, or will he be trapped in a surreal horror movie world forever? He has to be resourceful to escape his fate.

3.title: Swarmin' Norman

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

3.plot: Norman is assigned to collect insects for a class assignment, and he soon discovers that he has power over these insects and can make them do what he says.

4.title: Flight

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

4.plot: While on his first flight, Josh learns that the old women sitting near him is actually the Grim Reaper.

5.title: Pumpkinhead

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

5.plot: Siblings enter into a pumpkin patch that is owned by a murderous farmer who kidnaps kids, removes their head, and switches the heads with the pumpkins in his garden.

6.plot: Corey, a comic book nerd, gets yelled at by his favorite comic book artist, Allan Miller, at a convention. To get even, Corey steals Allan's brushes to make his own comics. Corey discovers the brushes can to turn the artwork into reality.

7.title: Sick

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

7.plot: Alex is at home sick with a common cold, or at least he thinks so. Secret government agents are destroying everything in the house before his sickness spreads to others.

8.title: Mascot

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

8.plot: Willie and Drake want to replace their school mascot, Big Yellow, with a wolf, but Big Yellow doesn't like their idea.

9.title: Bad Feng Shui

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

9.plot: A girl who doesn't respect her mother is given various animal figurines to teach her a lesson she won't soon forget.

10.title: The Hole

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

10.plot: After moving into a new home, a brother and sister discover that many years ago, an abusive man lived there with his family.

11.title: Scarecrow

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

11.plot: Young Jenny's acre is beset with bugs and birds, so, going against family advice, she accepts a scarecrow from a mysterious, intellectual stranger dressed in black.

12.title: Dreamcatcher

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

12.plot: During a stay at a sleep-away camp, two girls are harassed by a sadistic spider-like bogeyman called the Dreamcatcher.

13.title: The Most Evil Sorcerer: Part 1

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

13.plot: In a medieval English town ruled by a corrupt sorcerer named Margolin, two teenage orphans named Ned and Sara live under the tyrant's household. Seeking to escape his tyrannical rule gain freedom, they set out to dethrone the sorcerer and rid him of his magic. Along the way, they seek the help from Margolin's apprentice Gresilda.

14.title: The Most Evil Sorcerer: Part 2

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

14.plot: In a medieval English town ruled by a corrupt sorcerer named Margolin, two teenage orphans named Ned and Sara live under the tyrant's household. Seeking to escape his tyrannical rule gain freedom, they set out to dethrone the sorcerer and rid him of his magic. Along the way, they seek the help from Margolin's apprentice Gresilda.

15.title: Stage Fright

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

15.plot: During the school's Hansel and Gretel play, the teenagers performing it discover that it might be cursed.

16.title: Night of the Mummy

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

16.plot: Being the new kid in school isn't easy, but for Seth, it's worse. Odd things begin happening around him on a trip to a museum.

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

18.plot: When a young girl rescues a mysterious doll from neighbourhood bullies, she fixes it but it soon becomes clear that the doll is no ordinary plaything.

1.title: Grampires: Part 1

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

1.plot: When a brother and sister visit their grandpa at his retirement community, they soon discover why its residents only come out at night.

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

2.plot: A grandpa must protect and save his grandchildren from the bloodthirsty residents of his retirement community.

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

3.plot: When Lex rats out his friends for egging the house of a mysterious cat lady, her cats begin to follow him and take interest in his increasingly itchy arm cast.

5.plot: Eve feels like an outsider when her new baby brother is born. When a mysterious woodland creature tempts Eve, she must decide if she'll sacrifice her brother for a new family in the forest. Starring Willow Shields.

6.title: Spaceman

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

6.plot: Shortly after a 10 year-old boy who recently moved into a neighborhood meets a woman who gives him a space helmet with 2 way radio, he starts to hear voices from "Spaceman One" Even though there's no batteries in the helmet.

7.title: Red Eye

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

7.plot: Georgia always looks forward to receiving her dad's international postcards in the mail. But on this trip around the world, it appears as though someone, or something, seems to be following him. Guest starring Mackenzie Foy.

8.title: My Imaginary Friend

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

8.plot: Shawn has a problem - his best friend and his brother can't stand each other. But the real problem is the friend is imaginary and just refuses to leave.

9.title: Poof de Fromage

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

9.plot: Twelve-year-old Bobby has a new roommate -- a French exchange student who rapidly shows signs of being an alien -- with plans for Earth.

10.title: The Golem: Part 1

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

10.plot: After Jeremy and Bonnie's grandmother passes away, they travel to Russia to lay her ashes to rest and uncover a secret from her past. Guest starring Dylan Schmid and Kacey Rohl.

11.title: The Golem: Part 2

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

11.plot: Jeremy must use his grandmother's secret to save her village, and his sister, from an evil creature. Guest starring Dylan Schmid and Kacey Rohl.

12.title: The Girl in the Painting

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

12.plot: When Becky becomes obsessed with an enchanted painting, she starts recreating her own life to be identical to the girl in the painting's, but realizes that nothing is ever as perfect as it seems. Guest starring Bailee Madison.

13.title: Checking Out

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

13.plot: Digital tech addicts Chelsea and Jeremy are annoyed, to say the least, about having to get dragged along on vacation with their mundane parents. But when they come upon a hotel with a sinister secret, will the family fall apart forever?

14.title: Terrible Love

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

14.plot: Maggie is madly in love with the dreamy and popular Brendan and will do anything to get him to notice her. So when Cupid shows up offering to help, she asks him to double his usual dosage, resulting in a frightful attraction.

15.title: Séance

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

15.plot: A group of kids hold a ritual in their attic to contact a ghost and unfortunately, it becomes much more than just a kid's game.

16.title: Detention

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

16.plot: An unlikely group of high-school students spend the afternoon together in detention, where strange things start appearing. Eventually they must each face the truth of why they're really in detention or else be stuck in school forever.

17.title: Funhouse

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

17.plot: Kelly begins to notice that her brother has been acting strangely. As their dysfunctional family takes a toll on his psyche, he finds solace in a sinister fun-house run by a creepy carny.

18.title: Worry Dolls

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

18.plot: After receiving a set of worry dolls from her workaholic parents, Jodanna and her brother Max start encountering strange events around their house. Unable to get her parents attention, Jodanna realizes that whatever she worries about becomes a reality.

19.title: Lovecraft's Woods

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

19.plot: Three kids think they're taking a shortcut through the woods, but a strange force is stalking them and the woods themselves take on a life of their own.

20.title: Coat Rack Cowboy

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

20.plot: When the old tree in Ethan's backyard is cut down, the spirit of a vengeful convict who was hung on its branches returns.

21.title: Long Live Rock and Roll

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

21.plot: A boy gets a new guitar and it can make him a rock star, but it may cost him his soul.

22.title: Dead Bodies

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

22.plot: Jake Skinner is back, being his bad self.

23.title: My Robot

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

23.plot: Philip has his own robot, and while that sounds cool, it has certain... drawbacks.

24.title: Bad Egg

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

24.plot: Jason, a problem child, is given one more chance. Then he's accidentally given a monster.

25.title: Toy Train

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

25.plot: When Logan and his dad are tasked with cleaning out his grandfather's house, the ghosts of secrets long past come back to haunt them.

26.title: Uncle Howee

episode of.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour (TV Series 2010–2014)

26.plot: Jared tries to turn off an annoying kids show, but shutting off the TV isn't doing the trick.

imdb.plot outline: "R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour" is an anthology series aimed at kids and teens, and inspired by the stories of horror master R.L. Stine. Each thirty minute episode is a tale of horror and suspense, invariably involving a supernatural element. Disdaining gore and overt violence, the episodes rely on sharp story telling and imaginative cinematic techniques to evoke chills, thrills and scares.
imdb.title: R.L. Stine's The Haunting Hour

other companies.name: Marc Graue Recording Studios: Voiceover and Post

plot: 'R.L. Stine' (qv) leads young viewers on a creepy tour of tales featuring life-sized dolls, werewolves, and carnival clowns that are stalking children.::Kyle Koschmider

"'R.L. Stine' (qv)'s The Haunting Hour" is an anthology series aimed at kids and teens, and inspired by the stories of horror master 'R.L. Stine' (qv). Each thirty minute episode is a tale of horror and suspense, invariably involving a supernatural element. Disdaining gore and overt violence, the episodes rely on sharp story telling and imaginative cinematic techniques to evoke chills, thrills and scares.::annonymous

Author 'R.L. Stine' (qv) is known for his creepy novels for young adults, especially the "Goosebumps" and "Fear Street" collections. Like those books, this anthology series presents bone-chilling flights of fancy and dark morality tales for older kids unafraid of a good-old-fashioned scare. Despite the show's title, the spooky stories are only 30 minutes each, and are designed to produce shivers, but not nightmares. That being said, the sinister characters and frightening scenes may make even the most toilet-trained of tiny tots wet their pants, so please keep them in another room.::Jwelch5742
